column1: Description: Foreign direct investment per person (note that negative values, which occur when disinvestment exceeds new investments, are excluded)
Units of measure: constant 2012 US$ millions per person
Source: Development Initiatives calculations based on UNCTAD Stat and World Bank
Net inflows of foreign direct investment divided by the total population of each country
On the 'Data-wide' sheet, we have provided the indicator in a wide format. The values you see listed there are only from the 'value' column.
The following is data downloaded from Development Initiative's Datahub: http://devinit.org/data
It is provided on an as-is basis under an open-use license.
